name: T2 TKN
description: T2 TKN is an innovative payment solution built on the foundation of ‘programmable payments’. Our T2 Wallet enables users to program their payments for goods or services, in fiat or digital currencies, providing risk management for all parties. Every payment from T2 Wallet injects trust and transparency like never before, minimizing the risk of fraud, late payment and other payment problems that are escalating today. Whether you’re transacting for a camera or creative services or personal training sessions, or even if you’re a construction company building a property with many stakeholders, a payment program from T2 Wallet is just ‘set and send’.
